type: TS LF Trading Bot Error - Annoucement Condition Evaluation Error

definition.text: While evaluation an Announcement Condition code, the system encountered an error at the code you provided for that condition.

paragraphs.text: In the following section you will find the specific information received when this error occured.
You will only see it if you opened this page as a result of the error actually happening.
